text: Tara balala, apani prabhura kache prarthana karuna-tini bale dina ye, seta kirupa? Kenana, garu amadera kache sadrsyasila mane haya. Inasa'allaha ebara amara abasya'i pathaprapta haba. Musa (ah) balalena, tini balena ye, e gabhi bhukarsana o jala secanera srame abhyasta naya-habe niskalanka, nikhumta.
